data.scheme_name: Scheme for Participation in International fairs and exhibitions with Tea Board
data.benefits: Scheme provide reimbursement maximum upto 60% of project cost.
data.eligibility: All exporters holding valid exporters’ license are eligible to participate from Tea Board’s booth in exhibition.
data.conditions:
Only exporters submitting regular monthly export returns will be eligible for participation
The exporter must be dealing in only 100% Indian teas.
40 % of the total cost of a furnished booth will have to be borne by the exporter.
The company shall not be under any investigation/charged/prosecuted/debarred/black listed on any grounds related with trade and business.
data.beneficiaries: All exporters holding valid exporters’ license are eligible to participate from Tea Board’s booth in exhibition.
data.prerequisites:
Only exporters submitting regular monthly export returns will be eligible for participation
The exporter must be dealing in only 100% Indian teas.
40 % of the total cost of a furnished booth will have to be borne by the exporter.
The company shall not be under any investigation/charged/prosecuted/debarred/black listed on any grounds related with trade and business.
data.context: This Scheme is started by Minitsry of Commerce and Industry, launched in November 2021, for exporters to show case their products in international events
data.objective: To provide a platform to the exporters to show case their products in international events for promotion and facilitate generation of trade opportunities during the exhibition
data.description: Scheme provide reimbursement maximum upto 60% of project cost.
data.how_to_apply:
The eligible entity shall apply through Online Portal Link - https://onlineapps.teaboard.gov.in/
The eligible entity shall apply through Offline by filling the given application - https://www.teaboard.gov.in/pdf/Revised_Scheme_for_Participation_in_International_fairs_and_exhibitions_with_Tea_Board_29_11_17_pdf2688.pdf
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives after the approval from the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
1. Value added tea exporters - large range of products and samples. Other incidental things - accommodation, visa, interpreter, sampling equipment, logistics, extra furnishing, etc. 
  2. Since there are many companies exporting teas, there is a need to make a priority list. The parameters for priority list are: a. Y-o-Y growth (%) in aggregate export volume in general b. Y-o-Y growth (%) in aggregate export value in general c. Y-o-Y growth (%) in aggregate export volume for that particular market d. Y-o-Y growth(%)in aggregate export value for that particular market e. Export of value added teas. 
  3. In order to ensure equitable and fair representation from the Industry in an event, the following quota would be adhered to for implementation out of the admissible number of exporters to be accommodated in Tea Board’s stand for a particular fair/exhibition. 
  4. This may be treated as the general guideline in the aforesaid direction. However, quantum of selection from each segment would ultimately depend upon the actual availability and segment wise responses. Sr. No. Segment % representation 
    1.  Merchant Exporters 40% 
    2. Producer Exporters 30% 
    3. Entrepreneurs/Small growers 10% 
    4. Value added including organic 10% 
    5. First time entrant/ new companies 10% In case of more entries in segments 1-4, decision for selection will based on parameters as at C (1) above, whereas in case of segment 5 it will be based on drawing of lots
data.checklist_info_a:
Original e-ticket and boarding passes used during the journey along with cost break up.
Self-certified photocopies of money receipt, bank advice etc. evidencing payment made.
A self-certified copy of the certificate issued by DGFT.
The self-certified photocopy of the passport duly highlighting date of departure.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address, number & email id is availabe- 14, B.T.M. Sarani (Brabourne Road) Kolkata 700 001
Phone No. +91 33 2235 1331; Google Map at: https://goo.gl/maps/Wcoxe7k8LVv8Qsgn6
